FrageText.de: Auf wie vielen Rädern müssen Spikesreifen montiert sein?
FrageText.en: On how many wheels must spiked tires be installed?
FrageText.hr: Na koliko kotača moraju biti stavljene gume s čavlima?
FrageText.sl: Na katerih kolesih so lahko montirane ježevke?

de.Text: Mindestens auf den Rädern einer Achse

en.Text: At least on two driving wheels
At least on the wheels of one axle
At least on the front wheels

tr.Text: En az çekiş yapan iki tekerleğe
